column3: News;Prey Veng:------  At 9:00 pm on October 14
column4: 2018 a bridge Saang Saing in Thmey Thmey commune
column7: Prey Veng province collapsed.------The reason for the bridge falling down was high water and suspected poor foundations.------The 30 meter long
column8: 10 meter wide bridge was built sometime in the 2000’s from a government budget.------ ------ ------ ------
